long_description: The North Face Cinder 40 Pack is a versatile climbing pack that is just right for a day at the crag-not too big, not too small. Stands up on its own for easy loading. Removable hipbelt; removable framesheet. Roll-top closure; metal hardware. The North Face Cinder 40 Pack features removable rope carry for easy gear management; also has load-bearing haul loops and a stash pocket.
short_description: The North Face Cinder 40 Pack is a versatile climbing pack that is just right for a day at the crag-not too big, not too small.
